Title: Little Boy Blue
Plot: The girls spend a day at the horse tracks where Catherine and Helena risk it all. Max takes Grace home to meet his estranged family. Bette hosts a dinner party but her obsession over every detail gets on Jodi's nerves. Meanwhile, Jenny and Tina agree on a director, Kate Arden, who quickly becomes interested in Tina.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Contains offensive language and sex scenes
GuestStars: Annabella Sciorra,  Simone Bailly,  Winston Rekert,  Deanne Bray,  Kristanna Loken,  Tara Frederick,  Fran Gebhard,  Ken Camroux,  Myk Gordon,  Robin Douglas,  Aleks  Holtz,  Haley Beauchamp,  Jackson Allan
